title: Is Trump complimenting Officer Derek Shaven in the Rally?
subtitle: Chauffin was blamed for George Floyd's death, who died after a Minneapolis police officer kneeled on his neck and strangled him.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Derek Chauffin, who identified the news reports as the policeman who kneeled on George Floyd's neck before his death, was honoured for his service by the President of the United States, Donald Trump, at the 2019 rally.
